Technical documents
-----------------------------
	- The `Memorandum of Collaboration (MoC) <https://polybox.ethz.ch/index.php/s/zOhxUOEPwnyA2mp>`_ is available.
	- A list of seismic network codes is available `at the FDSN <https://www.fdsn.org/networks/?search=adriaarray>`_.
	- Station lists will be available `via the FDSN <https://www.fdsn.org/networks/?search=adriaarray>`_ and `via EIDA <https://www.orfeus-eu.org/data/eida/webservices/station/>`_.
	- `Best practice for field work, data management and QC of temporary deployments <https://polybox.ethz.ch/index.php/s/EreWWnfm2gQoLdD>`_.
	- `Station names and network codes <https://github.com/PetrColinSky/AdriaArray/blob/master/AdA/TechDocNames.pdf?raw=true>`_.
